review: Another simple way to have more tv choices and with already having prime membership....why not!
author: Nancy

review: I love it. Getting a second one!
author: nessad

review: Excellent device and great value. I also have the AMAZON Fire TV in another room and I love them both. Works great as I like to watch Netflix and listen to Pandora. Definitely recommend.
author: Glen Price "Morristown, NJ"

review: Great product! Love it!  Great to be able to watch Netflix without a cable and PC.
author: Gloria M.

review: I would have given it more stars but the extender was faulty and they didn't have one in stock. Still have not received that. Also, it's a little spotty hooking up to my 2nd TV even though I bought a Wi-Fi booster.
author: Mike

review: Outstanding product  I got it with  the subscription to sling TV amazing love to watch my hgtv
author: HECTOR IRIZARRY

review: So far so good for connecting to sling TV. Gets the job done after cutting cable.
author: Kara A. Medalis

review: I totally love my Fire Stick... the apps are awesome. .. also the movie channels.. Hulu plus, Hbogo
author: Cindy Twork

review: Love it! Canceling our cable as soon as our contract is up!!
author: Amazon Customer
